text: Harnaaz Kaur Sandhu (born 3 March 2000) is an Indian model and beauty pageant titleholder. She was crowned Miss Universe 2021. Sandhu had been crowned Miss Diva Universe 2021. She is the third Indian to win Miss Universe. Sandhu was born in Gurdaspur, Punjab, India. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Indian models Category:Miss Universe winners Category:Indian actors Category:Indian beauty pageant winners Category:Punjabi people
title: Harnaaz Sandhu
